flawed_nl_solution:
The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father 10 is 55 - 10 = <<55-10=50>>50.
The share each one of his friends including him will get is 50 / 5 = <<50/5=10>>10.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 50. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
